import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/TaskLists.css' import AddTask from './AddTask' import NavigationBar from './NavigationBar' import TaskElement from './TaskElement' import TaskStack from './TaskStack' function TaskLists({token, user}) { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false) const popup =
return (
{isModalOpen? popup: null}
) } export default TaskLists
